title: fatal error: unexpected signal during runtime execution when making DAG
body:
#### System information

Version: 1.4.7-stable-667a386d
Protocol Versions: [63 62 61]
Network Id: 1
Go Version: go1.5.4
OS: linux
GOPATH=
GOROOT=/usr/local/go
#### Expected behaviour

Geth run without crash
#### Actual behaviour

We changed the source code to use fix difficulty (0x10000), and then set up a private network with 
4 nodes, most nodes crashed after 1 day with this error.
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
#### Backtrace

Without providing the exact modifications you made to the ethash code, I don't see how we could figure out what goes wrong. Also tbh, it's a bit odd that you report an issue that only happens with your modifications. My gut feeling is that the bug is somewhere in your modified code :)
